channel.title: Delete or lock this topic
channel.description: Neonx has been ip banned from my server i gotten a bunch of emails as i asked with proof of the stuff that happen with him

item.title: Delete or lock this topic
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

[quote=“5 1, post:27, topic:449512”][quote author=KO9 link=topic=552412.msg4053195#msg4053195 date=1342712121]

“Flawless combat formula”

Which formula are you using then?

hey look its luke jr

What? I’m genuinely interested…
[/quote]
Luke used to post on all these new servers with these little remarks.[/quote]
Yes but Luke did it to discredit the server whereas I am simply curious which combat formula they’re using. Having written one myself I’m interested to know if anyone is actually still using it =p.

@The_Boss (and others): Stay on topic and don’t flame/harass.

Read full topic

item.title: Delete or lock this topic
item.dc:creator: @Artemis_Wp Artemis Wp
item.description:
@Artemis_Wp wrote:

This is about the children you can not control power management server, you are not old enough to do that and take stupid decisions, speak without you.
Better try to mature and can live a decent conversation with your players and understand them and everything will go well. Also there must be mutual respect between administrators of all private servers.
If you can fulfill all the above, you will not have problems such as DDoS.

My opinion.

Read full topic

item.title: Delete or lock this topic
item.dc:creator: @oldy oldy
item.description:
@oldy wrote:

[quote=“RSCRevamped, post:15, topic:449512”][quote author=-Nothing link=topic=552412.msg4052300#msg4052300 date=1342639288]

The staff didn’t even know how to add their dragon, so I had to give them LetsPK’s cache.

Please, if you’re going to post something, make it constructive criticism.

i dont think he realize its not hard to customize iron,steel,black,mith,addy, or rune items and change the name of them and add in the spirits. also sad since my server has been getting quite a few ppl on it all he can do is spam my topics and have his friends spam a bunch of junk around

Exactly, it’s not hard, yet Jut came to ask me for help on how to make dragon and how to make mods unattackable. I haven’t told anybody to spam ‘junk around’. I’m not sure what ‘junk’ they are spamming about, but I’m certain it’s the DDoS attacks you launched against our server. If so, it’s not ‘bunch of junk’, it’s a fact.

In overall, this shows your incapability to run a server. You lack the most of what it requires, I’ve heard there’s been multiple people helping you out with simple things like the dragon.
[/quote]

dont know anyone who can ddos let alone i dont know how to ddos myself.

seeing as your ddosing my server right now why not get a life your just mad your players are coming to my server for customs also staff never been attackable on my server idiot. seeing as you sit at your damn computer all day spamming and flaming my forums you can be updating your server making your members happy. but nope you sit there all day ranting flaming spamming ddosing the shit out of my server.

you got RSCEmulation and LOrsc closest 2 servers to real rsc with the xp rates just LOrsc doesnt have a big player base as emulation than you got Stork pk as the pking server than my server thats custom made that people thought were cool. i dont care if my player base gets above 30. let alone 100[/quote]

This is a complete lie. You know Will (who is NeoX), one of your staff members has a website affiliated with hackf0rums and delves into the darker side of the RSC Community. By the darker side, i mean posting people IP’s to get hacked and ddosing other servers. I will gladly post the evidence i was given from a friend if he allows me to do so, and if the moparscape staff ask.

Read full topic

item.title: Delete or lock this topic
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

7XRVc.png1440×900

And you’re saying you’re not DDoSing?

I have no reason to DDoS even if I could. Since RSCRevamped only has players that have quitted our server for reason or another, it also eliminates the lie about me advertising on your server. I haven’t ever visited your website or forums, and I never will as I have no reason to. I don’t know why you’re blaming me of everything. Like I said, I don’t give a flying fuck about your RSCRevamped.

Read full topic
